celsius.name: Degree Celsius
celsius.description: Scale based on freezing and boiling points of water

fahrenheit.name: Degree Fahrenheit
fahrenheit.description: Used mainly in the US, it defines the freezing point of water at 32°F and the boiling point at 212°F.

rankine.name: Degree Rankine
rankine.description: Absolute thermodynamic scale, where 0°R is absolute zero. Related to Fahrenheit.

reaumur.name: Degree Réaumur
reaumur.description: Scale where water freezes at 0°Ré and boils at 80°Ré.

romer.name: Degree Rømer
romer.description: Historical scale that defines the freezing point of water at 7.5°Rø.

newton.name: Degree Newton
newton.description: Scale that defines the freezing point of water at 0°N and the boiling point at 33°N.

delisle.name: Degree Delisle
delisle.description: Inverse scale where water boils at 0°De and freezes at 150°De.
